short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyzes web fonts usage and loading status on webpages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Font Usage Analyser - Optimise Your Web Fonts

This extension helps you identify unused and inefficient web font loading on any webpage. With a single click, you can:

- See all loaded web fonts and their current status
- View which fonts are actually being used on the page
- Identify unused font weights and styles that are being loaded unnecessarily
- Check font-family fallback chains
- Find duplicate font declarations

Perfect for:
- Web developers optimising page load times
- Front-end developers auditing font usage
- Web designers checking font implementation
- Performance optimisation specialists

Simply click the extension icon to analyse the current page. Results appear in an easy-to-read overlay showing loaded fonts, fonts in use, and potentially problematic font loading.

No data collection, no external services - everything runs directly in your browser.

---
Privacy Notice: This extension only analyses the current webpage when activated. It does not collect, store, or transmit any data.
